text_block_list.text: Congrats, Brian. That was some incredible running.
Congrats, Brian. That was some incredible running.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It sure felt like it. That might've been the best I've ever done.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: After all, this was the most I've ever wanted to win.
I think all those races you couldn't win led you to this point.
I think all those races you couldn't win led you to this point.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
But I'm not going to stop here. My urge to run is what I'll use to 
propel me forward.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Ahead of me is where my sister's waiting. She's the person I still need 
to defeat.

I can tell she really means itâ€”her eyes shine as passionately as her 
words.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So, when's my next race? I'm starving!
